snippet: Miguel Gutierrez’s “And lose the name of action” is a complex study of disconnection, examining the role perception plays in reality.
abstract: Alastair Macaulay reviews choreographer Miguel Gutierrez's multimedia dance piece And lose the name of action at Brooklyn Academy of Music.
lead_paragraph: Miguel Gutierrez’s “And lose the name of action” is a complex study of disconnection, examining the role perception plays in reality.

headline.seo: Miguel Gutierrez’s ‘And lose the name of action’ at BAM
headline.main: Six Performers Moving Through a Labyrinth of Perceptions
headline.print_headline: Six Performers Moving Through a Labyrinth of Perceptions
